definition: to comply/to conform to/in tune with/adapting to/to adjust to
to obey/to follow/to arrange/to make reasonable/along/favorable
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
surname Ying
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
inability to adjust/unable to adapt
going with nature and the seasons (TCM)

sentences.english: Although this follows a global trend, it can take some time.
sentences.chinese: 虽然这顺应了一场全球性的潮流，但它仍需要时间。

sentences.english: O2-TPD test indicates that adsorbed oxygen has no relationship complying with catalyst activity.
sentences.chinese: TPD实验表明吸附氧与催化剂活性没有顺应关系。

sentences.english: She gave to the motion of the horse.
Chapter Three gives the theoretical framework for the present study based on the Linguistic Adaptation Theory (Verschueren, 2000).
sentences.chinese: 第三章在语言顺应论的基础上提出了全文的理论框架。

sentences.english: Conforming to this theme, a large number of anti-terrorism films have been made in Hollywood.
sentences.chinese: 好莱坞顺应时代主题而拍摄出了一大批反恐影视剧作。

sentences.english: But I was learning really quickly. I got used to it after a break.
sentences.chinese: 还好我学得快，过了课间休息后我就顺应过来了。

sentences.english: You didn't make anything wrong; you just followed your instinct.
sentences.chinese: 你没有做错什么选择，你只是顺应着你的感觉阿。

sentences.english: Xie Hui could go with the stream and assist the new ruler, but he was still regarded as a dissident.
sentences.chinese: 谢晦虽能顺应潮流，佐命新朝，但终被视为异己。

sentences.english: Second, we must follow the trend of the times and develop scientifically.
sentences.chinese: 二是顺应潮流，科学发展。

sentences.english: Daoton Brand Design Consultant establishes to this trend, focusing on Brand plan and management.
sentences.chinese: 道顿品牌顺应潮流诞生，着力于品牌规划和管理。

sentences.english: The evolution of Henan University went with modern city transition of Kaifeng.
sentences.chinese: 河南大学的变迁顺应了近代开封的城市转型。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, metonymy in English news adapts to the social world.
sentences.chinese: 转喻的使用也顺应了社交世界。

sentences.english: This thesis revolves about the implications we can draw from Relevance-Adjustability Theoretical Approach (RATA in short) for the teaching of interpretation for political affairs.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要探讨了关联顺应理论对政务口译教学的启示。

sentences.english: Mao was eager to accelerate history; Zhou was content to exploit its currents.
sentences.chinese: 毛急于推动历史，周满足于顺应潮流。

sentences.english: Adjust to illuminate to act for the vogue trend of product.
sentences.chinese: 顺应着照明替代产品的时尚趋势。

definition: to cater to/to pander to
general trend/irresistible trend
going with nature and the seasons (TCM)
to follow/to abide by/to comply with/compliance
(idiom) to use methods appropriate to the current situation
to take advantage of the new situation (idiom)/to make the best of new opportunities
to comply with/to follow (directives)/to defer (to the judgment of superiors)
inevitable outcome/inescapable consequence
direction/trend/to incline
(literary) to make it so/to dictate
to conform with destiny/as the occasion demands
that which is yearned for by the public
to fit in with/to suit/appropriate
to accord with/conforming to
abreast of modern developments/to keep up with the times/progressive/timely
current situation/circumstances/current trend
